title.rendered: Getting Started w/ Lightning Templates Surf Force 17

content.rendered:
Getting Started with Lightning Community Templates
Surf Force September 22, 2017Bundoran, Ireland


Surf Force 2017

Overview
Overview of what the Lightning Community Templates are, how they are accessed and the differences between Customer Service vs Partner Central templates. Review of the OOTB Components that are available in builder. How to plan your community implementation, requirements gathering, security options, object selection, Community Management (Moderation, Topics, permissions), then how to release your community to new users and gain adoption.


The Deck



View Deck


Surf Force


View Session
